About

Hi, I'm Emanuil Kostadinov. For over six years now, I have been working in a top web hosting company learning a lot about Linux OS, DNS, MySQL, web servers, WordPress, PHP and other technologies.

In the past few years, I've also been learning to code. I've got an advanced JavaScript certification from SoftUni (Software University Ltd) and have gained experience with JavaScript and React. When I'm not working or coding, I like to spend time with my family, play chess, and play the guitar.
